text: MCCC may refer to: * Marie Curie Cancer Care * Mercer County Community College * Methylcrotonyl-CoA carboxylase, encoded by the genes MCCC1 and MCCC2 * Minor Counties Cricket Championship * Middlesex County Cricket Club * Monroe County Community College, located in Monroe, Michigan, United States * Montgomery County Community College, in Blue Bell, Pennsylvania, United States * 1300 in Roman numerals * The U.S. Army Maneuver Captains Career Course
title: MCCC
